explains: adj. 无力的；[劳经] 无能力的，无权的

sentences.en: If you don't have money, you're powerless.
sentences.cn: 如果你没有钱，你就无能为力。

sentences.en: I saw what was happening, but I was powerless to help.
sentences.cn: 我眼看着事情发生，却无力相助。

sentences.en: People are being murdered every day and I am powerless to stop it.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人被杀害，而我却无力制止。
